languages.text: {n}Раздраженная гримаса касается непроницаемого лица Владайма.{/n} "Конечно, Ваша Светлость. Прошу простить мне недостаток манер. Я был... не готов к подобным новостям".

traits.locale_text: {n}Раздраженная гримаса касается непроницаемого лица Владайма.{/n} "Конечно, Ваша Светлость. Недостаток манер я обещаю компенсировать полезностью".

languages.text: {n}A hint of irritation creeps into Vladaym's otherwise impenetrable expression.{/n} "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I apologise for my lack of manners. I was... unprepared for this development."
languages.original_text: {n}Раздраженная гримаса касается непроницаемого лица Владайма.{/n} "Конечно, Ваша Светлость. Прошу простить мне недостаток манер. Я был... не готов к подобным новостям".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym's impenetrable face takes on a hint of annoyance.{/n} "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I apologise for my lack of manners. I was... unprepared for such news."
{n}Vladaym's impenetrable face takes on a hint of annoyance.{/n} "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I apologise for my lack of manners. I was... unprepared for such news."

{n}A hint of irritation creeps into Vladaym's otherwise impenetrable expression.{/n} "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I apologise for my lack of manners. I was... unprepared for this development."

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムの鉄壁の表情に、かすかな苛立ちが滲み始める。{/n}「確かに、陛下。無礼をお詫びしよう。その…こういった展開になるとは思ってもみなかったのでな」
languages.original_text: {n}A hint of irritation creeps into Vladaym's otherwise impenetrable expression.{/n} "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I apologise for my lack of manners. I was... unprepared for this development."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムの鉄壁の表情に、かすかな苛立ちが滲み始める。{/n}「確かに、陛下。無礼をお詫びしよう。その…こういった展開になるとは思ってもみなかったのでな」

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆那原本不动神色的表情之中渗入了一丝恼怒。{/n}“当然没问题，大人。我为我的失礼道歉。我……没准备好面对这样的情况。”
languages.original_text: {n}A hint of irritation creeps into Vladaym's otherwise impenetrable expression.{/n} "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I apologise for my lack of manners. I was... unprepared for this development."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆那原本不动神色的表情之中渗入了一丝恼怒。{/n}“当然没问题，大人。我为我的失礼道歉。我……没准备好面对这样的情况。”

languages.text: {n}Se asoma un ápice de irritación asoma en la expresión impenetrable de Vladaym.{/n} «Desde luego, {mf|milord|milady}. Le pido disculpas por mi falta de modales. No estaba... preparado para este acontecimiento».
languages.original_text: {n}A hint of irritation creeps into Vladaym's otherwise impenetrable expression.{/n} "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I apologise for my lack of manners. I was... unprepared for this development."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se asoma un ápice de irritación asoma en la expresión impenetrable de Vladaym.{/n} «Desde luego, {mf|milord|milady}. Le pido disculpas por mi falta de modales. No estaba... preparado para este acontecimiento».

languages.text: {n}Sous son air autrement impénétrable, Vladaym semble légèrement irrité.{/n} « J'en prends bonne note, Votre Seigneurie. Je vous demande pardon pour cette impolitesse. Je ne... m'attendais pas à cette surprise. »
languages.original_text: {n}A hint of irritation creeps into Vladaym's otherwise impenetrable expression.{/n} "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I apologise for my lack of manners. I was... unprepared for this development."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sous son air autrement impénétrable, Vladaym semble légèrement irrité.{/n} « J'en prends bonne note, Votre Seigneurie. Je vous demande pardon pour cette impolitesse. Je ne... m'attendais pas à cette surprise. »

languages.text: {n}Ein Hauch von Verwirrung durchzieht Vladayms ansonsten undurchdringlichen Ausdruck.{/n} "Natürlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich bitte um Verzeihung für meinen Mangel an Manieren. Ich war ... auf diese Entwicklung nicht vorbereitet."
languages.original_text: {n}A hint of irritation creeps into Vladaym's otherwise impenetrable expression.{/n} "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I apologise for my lack of manners. I was... unprepared for this development."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Hauch von Verwirrung durchzieht Vladayms ansonsten undurchdringlichen Ausdruck.{/n} "Natürlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich bitte um Verzeihung für meinen Mangel an Manieren. Ich war ... auf diese Entwicklung nicht vorbereitet."

languages.text: {n}Vladaym'ın normalde hiçbir şeyin etki edemediği ifadesine bir miktar öfke sızıyor.{/n} "Elbette {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Terbiyesizliğim için özür dilerim. Ben... Bu gelişmeye hazırlıklı değildim."
languages.original_text: {n}A hint of irritation creeps into Vladaym's otherwise impenetrable expression.{/n} "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I apologise for my lack of manners. I was... unprepared for this development."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym'ın normalde çarpıtılamaz ifadesine bir miktar öfke hâkim oluyor.{/n} "Elbette {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Terbiyesizliğim için özür dilerim. Ben... Bu gelişmeye hazırlıklı değildim."
